oracle_text: Mill two cards. You may put a permanent card from among the milled cards into your hand. You gain 2 life. (To mill two cards, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: Wrenn had given everything and asked for nothing. She deserved a monument, but rest in a quiet meadow is all she would've wanted.

name: Serpent-Blade Assailant
oracle_text:
Backup 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.)
Deathtouch
flavor_text: "Kaldheim's cosmos was never yours to corrupt."

name: Sigiled Sentinel
oracle_text:
Backup 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.)
Vigilance
flavor_text: "Alara has been broken before. I will not let it break again."

name: Skittering Surveyor
oracle_text: When Skittering Surveyor enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Though no bigger than a hand, the surveyors were as vital to the resistance as the largest war constructs.

name: Stasis Field
oracle_text:
Enchant creature

flavor_text: Old glitches in mage-ring function became critical tools in Vryn's defense.

name: Swordsworn Cavalier

flavor_text: The Royal Knights of Belenon are equally practiced in courtesy and combat.

card_faces.name: Tarkir Duneshaper
card_faces.oracle_text: {4}{G/P}: Transform Tarkir Duneshaper. Activate only as a sorcery. ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Obey the teachings of the dragonlords, for they provide all. They grant us magic and safety, and in return we offer respect."
—Baihir, Dromoka mage

card_faces.name: Burnished Dunestomper
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Your precious dragonlords repressed your instincts, cur. You were born a hunter. Evolve, and hunt again."
—Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

name: Temporal Cleansing
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
The owner of target nonland permanent puts it into their library second from the top or on the bottom.
flavor_text: "Now's not a good time."

oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Tenured Oilcaster gets +3/+0 as long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
Whenever Tenured Oilcaster attacks or blocks, each player mills a card.

name: Thornwood Falls
oracle_text:
Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text: Deep in Eldraine's wilds, strange eyelike appendages twined among the vines and faerie lights.

name: Thrashing Frontliner
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Thrashing Frontliner attacks a battle, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: With Urabrask in hiding, the masterless Furnace Host was unleashed on the Multiverse to spread mayhem and destruction.

name: Thunderhead Squadron
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
flavor_text: Just as all seemed lost, the griffin riders of Zhalfir arrived with the force of a gathered storm.

name: Tidal Terror
oracle_text:
Whenever Tidal Terror attacks, you may tap two other untapped creatures you control. If you do, Tidal Terror can't be blocked this turn.
Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Timberland Ancient
oracle_text:
Reach, trample
Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor_text: Only the trees were old enough to remember what happened when Moag ignored warnings of Phyrexia millennia ago. They were determined not to repeat the mistake.

name: Trailblazing Historian
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}: Another target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Spells once used to traverse Lorehold excavation sites were swiftly repurposed to keep the students one step ahead of the Invasion Tree's grasp.

name: Tranquil Cove
oracle_text:
Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped.
When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text: The sky darkened and the seas turned to oil as the gods of Theros themselves fell to New Phyrexia.

name: Traumatic Revelation
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a creature or battle card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. If you don't, incubate 3. all_parts.name: Incubator // Phyrexian

flavor_text: "My new form must be hard to understand."

name: Unseal the Necropolis
oracle_text: Each player mills three cards. Then you return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill three cards, a player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text: On Amonkhet, Phyrexia found a ready-made army of horrors waiting for a new master.

name: Urn of Godfire
oracle_text:
{2}: Add one mana of any color.
{6}, {T}, Sacrifice Urn of Godfire: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
flavor_text: Ephara blessed the defenders of Theros with godfire, a Nyx-infused incendiary substance that burned without fuel.

name: Vanquish the Weak
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text: When Atraxa first arrived, the people of New Capenna rejoiced at the sight of such a grand angel. Then the slaughter began.

name: Vengeant Earth
oracle_text: Target creature or land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste in addition to its other types until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor_text: When Zendikar's defenders faltered, the Roil rose up to shake the invaders from its back.

name: Volcanic Spite
oracle_text: Volcanic Spite deals 3 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle. You may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: None may approach the Ashen Idol without an offering—an edict fortuitously absent from Phyrexian intelligence concerning the world of Azgol.

name: War Historian
oracle_text:
Reach
War Historian has indestructible as long as it attacked a battle this turn.
flavor_text: All children on Kamigawa learn of the Kami War. Hostilities with beings from another reality were understood, and no time was wasted in disbelief.

name: War-Trained Slasher
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever War-Trained Slasher attacks a battle, double its power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"That's my girl. Just don't eat it—wouldn't want you getting an upset stomach again."
—Jalina, Ikorian bonder

name: Wary Thespian
oracle_text: When Wary Thespian enters the battlefield or dies, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: The Cabaretti performance had veered off-script ... so how were the acrobats still moving in perfect unison?

name: Wildwood Escort
oracle_text:
When Wildwood Escort enters the battlefield, return target creature or battle card from your graveyard to your hand.
If Wildwood Escort would die, exile it instead.
flavor_text: With Eldraine's human knights called away to defend the courts, lost travelers were surprised to find themselves whisked to safety by the secretive folk of the wilds.

name: Wind-Scarred Crag
oracle_text:
Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped.
When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text: Serra was a symbol of hope to Dominaria, so Norn defiled her temples with monuments to Phyrexia.

name: Wrenn's Resolve
oracle_text: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
flavor_text: Even as she burned, Wrenn bent Realmbreaker to her will.

name: Zephyr Winder
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Zephyr Winder deals combat damage to a player, untap up to one target creature.
flavor_text: It twines through the roiling cloudscape feeding on the energies of nascent storms.

name: Zhalfirin Shapecraft
oracle_text:
Target creature has base power and toughness 4/3 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Patient and observant, the people of Zhalfir lurked beyond the veil of time until their moment came to finally strike at Phyrexia.
